4df9516e-7321-4acf-8078-aa28ef12600e.name: 脆弱眼部
4df9516e-7321-4acf-8078-aa28ef12600e.notes: 对手在其视线范围内对你的眼部进行攻击时只受到 -6 命中惩罚

6c6cd00a-1031-4958-981b-8594e48fe803.name: 硬皮
6c6cd00a-1031-4958-981b-8594e48fe803.notes: 任何只需要接触皮肤的影响忽略此 DR

24529266-743a-4451-9ed3-cc3825ad3f8e.name: 高痛阈
24529266-743a-4451-9ed3-cc3825ad3f8e.notes: Never suffer shock penalties when injured; +3 on all HT rolls to avoid knockdown and stunning; +3 to resist torture

4ba352c6-5a89-4e7c-9a56-d0826c6735d2.name: 氧气储存
4ba352c6-5a89-4e7c-9a56-d0826c6735d2.notes: “屏息”时间是通常情况的 25 倍

8416266c-9382-4934-9733-b6e837d6eb5b.name: 氧气储存
8416266c-9382-4934-9733-b6e837d6eb5b.notes: “屏息”时间是通常情况的 50 倍

24328f28-876e-411b-a6e0-c7a9ea2f8b02.notes: “屏息”时间是通常情况的 100 倍

10a41778-b52a-4102-91bc-2a6eac6b7624.name: 氧气储存
10a41778-b52a-4102-91bc-2a6eac6b7624.notes: “屏息”时间是通常情况的 200 倍

a94e7569-f79c-44a1-986a-be799913eb0a.name: 氧气储存
a94e7569-f79c-44a1-986a-be799913eb0a.notes: “屏息”时间是通常情况的 300 倍

b9f50ab3-23f4-4f56-8cba-f4dd7dc97894.name: 增强时间感
b9f50ab3-23f4-4f56-8cba-f4dd7dc97894.notes: You immediately act in combat before those without Enhanced Time Sense; Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

554a510e-e623-465d-a406-3094d5d43a70.name: Eight-hour energy reserve, Refuel 3 times per day

8a160bba-6eef-4676-9f1f-645a0bb02950.name: No fatigue points, Don't spend fatigue points
